name: Pantherx Rare Pharmacy
descriptions: Developed Angular Material app for form data management using NGRX store.
Created full-stack Analytics app with .NET Core MVC, Angular, Azure B2C, and Tableau APIs.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and IaC for Angular and .NET Core applications.
Integrated Twilio for SMS communication with patients.

name: Dick's Sporting Goods
descriptions: Developed React TypeScript web app for inventory management.
Enhanced Android Kotlin app for online purchase flow using CQRS Spring Cloud backend.
Collaborated with store teams to create applications in React, TypeScript, C#, and SQL.

name: Computer Enterprises Inc.
descriptions: Built Angular web app for scout reports with autosave and theming features.
Implemented paywall functionality using Drupal CMS.
Generated data mappings for financial files using Entity Framework and SQL Server.
